item.title: Basic Video Editing (Intro/Outro + Add Voiceover) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi looking for a creative video editor for basic lifestyle Youtube and various social media platforms, 2-5 mins long.

We have a few dozen videos to edit weekly. More work can be provided if deliverables are good.

Tasks:
- Create and add simple intro/outro
- Add voiceover audio/music
- Basic trimming/cropping

Responsibilities:
- Fluent in English
- Know how to use Premiere or other video editing software
- Attention to details
- On time delivery
- Punctual and good communication skills

Looking forward to your application!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$4.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 09:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.description:
Heya,

G- Capital is a real estate marketing agency, promoting its products world wide.

Looking to connect to a social media video content creator / motion graphic designer - 2D video animation artist for all our motion visual marketing needs.

once we are happy with the result we will stick to one supplier, we enjoy working and "walking" 'the journey' together, with all our business partners.

item.title: Video Editor - YouTube Cashcow - 20+ min - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a passion for creating compelling content? We are looking for a professional with experience in producing high-quality, long videos (20 minutes and more).

Requirements:

- Experience editing top-quality long-form videos. (20minute+)
- Proficiency in implementing smooth transitions and relevant animations.
- Originality is a must; avoid content from other cashcow channels.
- Commitment to producing 14 videos per week.
- Able to produce engaging documentaries for our YouTube channel.
- Proven track record of high view retention.

Join our team and bring our vision to life by producing visually appealing and engaging content. Send your portfolio. We look forward to your creative contribution! 🌟

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 16, 2024 08:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Animation, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Video Editing, Video Production, Graphic Design, Animation, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: YouTube True Crime & Interrogation Video Editor (up to $700-$1,500/month) - Upwork
item.description:
This is not just another job posting where you get 3 videos to edit and then the person ghosts you because they gave up on the project, I have generated over 20M views in the past 12 months across my long-form channels, I know what I'm doing and this is my latest project.

My partner and I are committed to the interrogation and true crime niche for at least 42 videos, we already have a winning team and are looking for skilled editors to join our team.

If you're the standard LAZY upwork type that overpromises and underdelivers, don't even apply. You'll get destroyed by our expectations. If you're actually a top 5% editor and can edit for reasonable prices given the volume of work, we will give you as many scripts as you can handle. We're ready to scale.

What is needed:
- Ability to edit true crime and interrogation videos better than 95% of other editors

Project Description: Watch this Loom and fill this form please, just fill it out properly, if we like your application, we will reach out to you here on Upwork with more details: https://forms.gle/JPphqiK9oLYTN4L38

Please have the humility to not apply if you're not a top 5% editor. Sink or swim.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 16, 2024 08:30 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:Writing, Scriptwriting, Content Writing, English
Skills: Writing, Scriptwriting, Content Writing, English
Country: Czech Republic
click to apply

item.description:
